item.description: Whether you are new to Tufts or you have been working on the Medford campus for years, chances are that you spend all of your time in one building. Maybe you have ventured to Ballou or Dowling for a meeting, but have you ever walked through the library? Did you know that Faculty & Staff can borrow DVDs and Books from the library? Do you know the story behind the Jumbo Statue or behind the painted cannon? Take this opportunity to get our of your office, meet some colleagues, and learn about the Tufts Medford Campus including at whom our cannon is allegedly pointed.
item.name: Jumbo Campus Tour (Date/Time Confirmed, still weather dependent)
